        <keyword>SIMULATION MODELS</keyword>         <keyword>DATA</keyword>         <keyword>2014</keyword>         <topcClas>Politics</topcClas>         <topcClas>Reference and instructional resources</topcClas>       </subject>       <abstract><p>Abstract copyright UK Data Service and data collection copyright owner.</p>This data is the companion to the SCID project's Voter Model (an agent-based simulation model of voting behaviour). The data is a subset of the 1992 wave of the BHPS data, in which respondents/households have been anonymised and responses have been inputted.  The data allows researchers external to the SCID team to run the model with the original data source. This data can be used to initialise the simulation model and add new agents to the model. </abstract>       <sumDscr>         <nation>United Kingdom</nation>         <geogUnit>No spatial unit</geogUnit>         <anlyUnit>families and households</anlyUnit>         <anlyUnit>individuals</anlyUnit>         <dataKind>Numeric</dataKind>         <dataKind>Textual</dataKind>       </sumDscr>     </stdyInfo>     <method>       <dataColl>         <collMode>Used existing data from the BHPS data. Please see UK Data Archives' Discover search tool, to locate this data.</collMode>         <sources />       </dataColl>     </method>     <dataAccs>       <setAvail>         <accsPlac>UK Data Service</accsPlac>       </setAvail>       <useStmt>         <contact><a href="mailto:laurence.lessard-phillips@manchester.ac.uk">Laurence Lessard-Phillips, University of Manchester</a></contact>         <contact><a href="mailto:info@understandingsociety.ac.uk">Jakob Petersen, ISER, University of Essex</a></contact>       </useStmt>     </dataAccs>     <othrStdyMat />   </stdyDscr> </codeBook>
